mapper.select: SELECT SSH.PLNT_CD , SSH.SPCM_IDX , SSH.HIS_SEQ , SSH.HIS_REV_NO , SSH.CHG_REA , SSH.UDT_HIS , SSH.UDT_IP , SSH.UDT_DS , SSH.UDT_UID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER SU WHERE SU.USER_ID = SSH.UDT_UID) UDT_UNM FROM SD_SPCM_HIS SSH WHERE SSH.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND SSH.SPCM_IDX = #{spcmIdx} ORDER BY HIS_SEQ
